DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate usefulness respirophasic variation carotid artery peak flow velocity measure Doppler ultrasound , noninvasive easily accessible , predictor fluid responsiveness patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Respirophasic Carotid Artery Peak Velocity Variation Predictor Fluid Responsiveness Patients With Coronary Disease
DOC.criteria: 1. patient schedule elective isolated offpump coronary artery bypass graft surgery 1. cardiac rhythm sinus 2. congestive heart failure 3. leave ventricular ejection fraction < 35 % 4. history transient ischemic attack 5. preexisting cerebrovascular disease peripheral arterial occlusive disease 6. presence carotid artery stenosis > 50 %
